title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7848.3 - Written comments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7848.3 - Written comments

State Regulations
(a) Interested persons may submit written comments in connection with the draft

State Energy Plan. Written comments shall be submitted by a date specified by
the board. (b) Written comments may
address any aspect of, or issue addressed in, the draft State Energy Plan. Commenters are encouraged to include in their written comments a description of
their interest and experience in the subject being addressed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7848.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
